projects.title: Kaza E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Created and maintained a comprehensive e-Commerce website with modern design, responsive layouts, and optimal performance. Implemented dynamic web solutions following company standards and best practices.

projects.title: 2B  Website
projects.description: Maintained and enhanced the main 2B e-Commerce website with re-designs, seasonal updates, and production work. Conducted performance optimization and scalability testing to ensure optimal website speed.

projects.title: Raneen SmartStore
projects.description: Specialized in Frontend Magento development, crafting and maintaining front-end code for Magento-based platforms. Ensured seamless integration of designs and responsive layouts.

projects.title: 2B-CS WordPress Site
projects.description: Created the 2B-CS website using WordPress, including developing custom themes and plugins to meet company requirements and improve user experience.

projects.title: Aman
projects.description: Worked on revamping APIs, marketplaces, and dashboards using Magento 2 backend. Designed and implemented multiple modules, integrated payment gateways and shipping providers.

projects.title: Anasity Website
projects.description: Created and maintained a comprehensive e-Commerce website with modern design, responsive layouts, and optimal performance. Implemented dynamic web solutions following company standards and best practices.

projects.title: Zoop App
projects.description: Developed a pet care mobile app where users can create pet profiles, book appointments with veterinarians, and manage their pets' health records. Additionally, built a separate app for doctors and assistants to efficiently manage bookings and appointments they receive.
